MaxWalkSpeed.Description: Base max walk speed of the Legion

TerrorRadius.Description: Base terror radius, in centimeters, of the Legion

Frenzy_MovementSpeedModifier.Description: Increase the max walk speed by this amount when in Frenzy

Frenzy_TerrorRadiusModifier.Description: Increase the terror radius by this amount, in centimeters, while in Frenzy

Frenzy_Duration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the Frenzy effect.

Frenzy_RechargeDuration.Description: Time, in seconds, needed for the Frenzy power to charge from empty to full.

Frenzy_UsagePercentNeededToStartFrenzy.Description: Ratio of max Frenzy usage time needed before it can be started.

Frenzy_CooldownDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the Frenzy cooldown.

Frenzy_PalletVaultDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the pallet vault interaction when the killer is in Frenzy.

Frenzy_WindowVaultDuration.Description: Duration. in seconds, of the window vault interaction when the killer is in Frenzy

Frenzy_PutCamperInBleedoutChargeBonus.Description: Time, in seconds, that will be added to the Frenzy charge when hitting a camper causing injured bleedout to start.

Frenzy_ChargeToLoseOnRemoveBleedoutTimeA.Description: Frenzy charge time, in seconds, to lose when launching an attack that removes bleedout time.

Frenzy_ChargeToLoseOnNonFrenzyAttack.Description: Frenzy charge time, in seconds, to lose when launching an attack while not in Frenzy.

Frenzy_ChargeToLoseOnMissedFrenzyAttack.Description: Frenzy charge time, in seconds, to lose when launching a missed attack while in Frenzy.

Frenzy_AllowManuallyEnd.Description: If set to 1, the killer can end the Frenzy manually before the time runs out.

SlasherAttackFrenzySucceedCooldownTimeHe.Description: Cooldown time, in seconds, after successfully attacking a healthy camper while in Frenzy.

SlasherAttackFrenzySucceedCooldownTimeIn.Description: Cooldown time, in seconds, after successfully attacking an injured but not bleeding out camper while in Frenzy.

SlasherAttackFrenzySucceedCooldownTimeBl.Description: Cooldown time, in seconds, after successfully attacking an injured but bleeding out camper while in Frenzy.

Bolt_FOVModifier.Description: Modifier to the field view while running in bolt. Does not stack with addons.
